column4: Hello, Im having a serious problem. I cant use the u of my keyboard. Before the previous reboot, I would get this problem, but if I installed a new keyboard layout it would get fixed. Now it doesnt. (I now paste the letter u to write :/ )
I thoght it was a shortcut problem, but nothing is binded to u
no way, like I said, I co  you, Seveas, you gotta believe me.
